decoworld.model.sound

Class SoundManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.sound.SoundManager

  • public class SoundManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all sound events in DECOWORLD Allows creation and manipulation of: Track objects background music atmospheric overlays Effect objects player effects object effects environmental effects

      • playOverlayTrackCollection

        public long playOverlayTrackCollection(java.lang.String collectionName,
                              int order)
        Play collection of tracks overlayed on any other playing music
        Parameters:
        collectionName - name of collection
        order - order of play of collection 0 : random 1 : linear natural order -1 : linear backwards order
        Returns:
        long Id of track played

      • playOverlayTrack

        public long playOverlayTrack(java.lang.String trackName,
                    boolean loop)
        Play single track, overlayed on any other playing music
        Parameters:
        trackName - name of track to be played
        loop - whether the track will be looped or not
        Returns:
        long Id of track played

      • playSeqTrack

        public long playSeqTrack(java.lang.String trackName,
                boolean loop)
        Play single track, *sequentially* (pauses any other playing music first)
        Parameters:
        trackName - name of track to be played
        loop - whether the track will be looped or not
        Returns:
        long Id of track played

        trackId - Id of track to be stopped
